snippet: The Ecstatic Music Festival had some unlikely pairings on Tuesday at Merkin Concert Hall.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performances in the second program of the Ecstatic Music Festival at Merkin Concert Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Ecstatic Music Festival had some unlikely pairings on Tuesday at Merkin Concert Hall.
